title: Leonard Fournette Interview, More Drama In Pittsburgh (Football 10/25)
description:
Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora discuss the continuing drama in Pittsburgh involving WR Martavis Bryant (3:36) and Vontaze Burfict not being suspended (8:33). Then the guys are joined by Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco for this week's edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right' (13:17) and answer if Carson Wentz is a legitimate MVP candidate, if the Dolphins will make the postseason, if the Chargers are the best team in the AFC West, and more. Then, Jaguars rookie sensation Leonard Fournette joins the podcast (34:30) to talk about Jacksonville's solid start, if he still thinks the NFL is 'easy', him waving on the Steelers' Mike Mitchell for impact, his health and practicing against the Jags incredible defense.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
